product.longDescription: All purple leaves with light-purple stems. Use as a colorful garnish on top of desserts or to add robust flavor and visual interest to summery cocktails. A critical ingredient in many Asian dishes, including those of Thailand, Laos, Indonesia, and the Philippines. Based on our yield trial, we recommend seeding 6 gm per tray at approx. 5 flats per oz of seed. Avg. days to maturity was 25.5 days when harvested at the first true leaf (as opposed to cotyledon) stage. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 324,000 seeds/lb.

Basil, Red Rubin Organic Microgreen Seed

Product ID:924MG.26924MG
Zoom Image

Basil, Red Rubin Organic Microgreen Seed

Product ID:924MG.26924MG

All purple leaves with light-purple stems. Use as a colorful garnish on top of desserts or to add robust flavor and visual interest to summery cocktails. A critical ingredient in many Asian dishes, including those of Thailand, Laos, Indonesia, and the Philippines. Based on our yield trial, we recommend seeding 6 gm per tray at approx. 5 flats per oz of seed. Avg. days to maturity was 25.5 days when harvested at the first true leaf (as opposed to cotyledon) stage. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 324,000 seeds/lb.
